articles.title: Western officials in protest over Israel Gaza policy - BBC.com
articles.description: More than 800 officials in the US and Europe have penned a letter calling for more pressure on Israel.
articles.content:
By Tom BatemanBBC State Department correspondent
More than 800 serving officials in the US and Europe have signed a statement warning that their own governments' policies on the Israel-Gaza war coul… [+6427 chars]

articles.title: Measles surge causes alarm: what scientists think - Nature.com
articles.description: A drastic rise in infections in the United Kingdom and Europe follows a drop in vaccine uptake.
